content: the tea rose spa set is designed to pamper and invigorate the skin body mind and spirit this collection of reusable eco-friendly skin care essentials and spa tools includes a crochet face scrubby make up remover pad bath pouf soap saver pouch and facial washcloth all designs are quick and easy and suitable for beginners there is no sewing or attaching of pieces needed all items are worked in one piece the face scrubby includes a special puff worked in the round and can be crocheted in 15-20 minutes it can be a great stash buster if you have some extra cotton yarn lying around the bath pouf loofah is very quick to work up as well taking only about 45 minutes and uses less than one full skein of the lily sugar n cream yarn in this pattern the mesh soap saver pouch or soap holder bag has a nifty little drawstring that fits a standard bar of soap and takes only 30 minutes to crochet lastly the facial washcloth can be whipped up in an hour s time and features the beautiful but oh so easy suzette stitch this gift set is perfect as a mother s day gift birthday gift teacher gift retirement gift or even an appreciation thank you gift for anyone that could use some pampering and self-care they re also great for selling at craft fairs ~~~ **finished measurements ** face scrubby 4 in diameter bath pouf 3 5 wide 11 circumference soap saver pouch 5 wide x 5 5 tall when laid flat facial washcloth 10 x 10 **level ** beginner requires familiarity with stitches used below and attaching yarn **stitches/terms us terms ** magic_ring magic_ring yo yarn over skip skip st stitch chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet increase increase insert two sts in one st **materials ** * worsted medium weight 4 100% cotton yarn *note i used lily sugar n cream yarn 120 yards/skein in the following colors tea rose 2 skeins camomile 2 skeins white 1 skein * * 6 00 mm hook * yarn needle * scissors ~~~ *this pattern
